Name: Battle Imagine - Muku Chief
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Muku Chief's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Furious Hammer.

Arcane! Furious Hammer
Summon Boss: Muku Chief to slam the ground around, dealing AoE Attack Damage. It can be charged 2 times.
Upon the skill cast, your Crit andcritical DMG are increased for a period.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
